thread.title: American Idol Live! sends top five to McCaw Hall Tuesday
thread.title_full: American Idol Live! sends top five to McCaw Hall Tuesday | The Seattle Times

author: Misha Berson
title: American Idol Live! sends top five to McCaw Hall Tuesday
text:
After several years of tumbling ratings, it’s no surprise that “American Idol” has downsized the concert tour of its 2015 champs. The series that spawned some big stars (Carrie Underwood, Kelly Clarkson), not to mention other TV vocal contests (“The Voice”), bows out next year after airing its 15th and final season. What’s less expected is the favorable buzz the current American Idol Live! tour is generating. Pared down to the top five vocalists this time, and stopping in smaller venues, the show features 2015 winner Nick Fradiani (pictured), plus Clark Beckham, Jax, Rayvon Owen and Tyanna Jones.
7:30 p.m. Tuesday, Aug. 25, at McCaw Hall, 321 Mercer St., Seattle Center; $49-$63.50 (800-745-3000 or ticketmaster.com ).
Misha Berson: mberson@seattletimes.com
